metaTags.metaDescription: Cloudflare has been recognized in the 2024 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for Single-Vendor SASE report for its ability to execute and completeness of vision. Cloudflare is one of only nine vendors recognized in the report.

marketoEmbeddedForm.marketoFormHeaderText: Get the Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for Single-Vendor SASE

relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare named for the first time in 2024 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for Single-Vendor SASE
relatedBlades.subtitle: Delivered from unified platform that modernizes your network
relatedBlades.copy:
Cloudflare has been recognized in the 2024 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for Single-Vendor SASE report for its Ability to Execute and Completeness of Vision. Cloudflare is one of only nine vendors recognized in the report.

We believe this recognition is a testament to Cloudflare's "light branch, heavy cloud" architecture and its ability to help global, cloud-minded enterprises accelerate their network modernization. For us, it is a testament to our connectivity cloud and its ability to consolidate more use cases onto our unified platform and simplify our customers' architectures across applications, network, and cybersecurity.

![sase-gartner-2024-image](//cf-assets.www.cloudflare.com/slt3lc6tev37/1WkZsZuSrskiUBRGrarra9/f3fe18f7ba3696790dddda4e5649a32d/sase-gartner-2024-image.png)
